pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Partitioning for Canonical Analysis // This function calculates the independent contribution of each explanatory variable to explained variation (R-squared) on RDA,CCA and db- RDA, applying the hierarchy algorithm of Chevan, A. and Sutherland, M. 1991 Hierarchical Partitioning.The American Statistician, 90-96 DOI:10.1080/00031305.1991.10475776.
